author: PTI
title: COVID-19: Deepika Padukone to discuss mental health with WHO chief
description: With an aim to prioritise mental health during the coronavirus pandemic, Bollywood star Deepika Padukone and WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom Gheb
content:
With an aim to prioritise mental health during the coronavirus pandemic, Bollywood star Deepika Padukone and WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus will engage in a discussion, the actor announced on Sunday.
Coronavirus India lockdown Day 26 updates… [+567 chars]
